name: Tenderfoot Tactics: The Foreverlands
description:
Far away from the archipelago, past the outer islands, past the great sea, past the boundaries of now and even of then, where our world touches the fae, there is a place called the foreverlands.

An ancillary prologue and early gameplay demo for the upcoming Tenderfoot Tactics.

badru - code / art / writing / design

michael bell - sound / music

isa hutchinson - design / writing
